input.sentences: my grandpa and i are taking a rest from all the excitement at his job .
my grandparents and i decided to take a picture of our exciting day .
my dad had to work so he could not join us at the museum .
i am playing on the peg board by making imprints of my hands .
my grandpa and i are trying to find different looking rocks for my collection .
output.sentences: The little boy and his dad were taking a rest when they were home from his job.
The next day, they took a picture with his grandparents because it was exciting they were visiting.
To celebrate, they visited the museum and they were joined by his dad.
At the museum, the little boy was playing with a peg board, making imprints of his hand.
The little boy searched through rocks with his grandpa to add to his collection.
